abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.d9208f9b7d827aec]{React Under Fire} by taking a hit or crashing through an obstacle, you may (after rolling) replace the value of your action die with the Gladiator's integrity; if you do, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.93d2d69b7e2b85e1]{Lose Momentum} (-1).

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.723192c97fec4fe2]{Clash} with brutal power by overcharging weapons or overloading melee servos, you may add +integrity/2 (rounded up). If you do, count a weak hit as a miss.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.3f5a834fa3fea5d1]{Gain Ground} using the staggering strength or resistance of the Gladiator, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
